content.body: https://fetch.spec.whatwg.org/#concept-scheme-fetch for a blob makes no mention of sniffing the content type of a blob. Does that mean it is non-standard to sniff the content type?
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: https://fetch.spec.whatwg.org/#concept-scheme-fetch for a blob makes no mention of sniffing the content type of a blob. Does that mean it is non-standard to sniff the content type?
